title: The Ragdoll and His Bossy Male Leads - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Yaoi
tags: Amnesia   Animal Characteristics   Black Belly   Comedic Undertone   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Dragons   Familial Love   Ghosts   Hiding True Abilities   Knights   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Mpreg   Pets   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Transmigration   Vampires   World Hopping
author: 三千桃夭
description:
Su Yao just beat up a few hooligans and the next second, he pounced on the man, faking his fragility and fear while weeping, “I’m so scared.” 

The man caressed Su Yao’s hair and gently comforted, “Don’t be afraid, you have me.” 

System: …Host, you are so good at acting. Besides, My Lord, is there something wrong with your eyes?>
